quotes.text: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
quotes.bookTitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.text: The only way out is through.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.text: So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.text: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
quotes.author: Jane Austen
